name: Invictus
notes: Fresh aquatic citrus with ambergris vibe. Great gym/daytime.

name: Studio
notes: Clean woody-aromatic; office-safe and versatile.

name: Mahnoor
notes: White florals + musk; soft, slightly sweet.

name: Ombre Black
notes: Dark vanilla/woods mood—evening friendly.

name: Khamrah
notes: Cinnamon, praline, boozy sweetness; cozy cold-weather beast.

name: Janan Platinum
notes: Elegant woody-spicy fragrance with a warm, long-lasting base.

name: Janan Vanilla
notes: Sweet and creamy vanilla fragrance with a smooth, comforting dry-down.

name: Janan Sport
notes: Fresh, energetic citrus and aromatic blend — ideal for casual wear.

name: Janan Gold
notes: Rich, warm oriental blend with a luxurious amber and spice profile.

name: Janan Intense
notes: Deep, bold oriental fragrance with rich spices and woods.

name: Janan Tobacco
notes: Warm, sweet tobacco accord with hints of honey and spice.

name: Janan Oud
notes: Opulent oud fragrance with smoky, resinous depth.

name: J. Marine
notes: Aquatic and refreshing scent with marine notes and light woods.

name: J. Frontline
notes: Bold and energetic fragrance with fresh spices and citrus.

name: J. Great Summit
notes: Adventurous woody-aromatic blend inspired by the great outdoors.

name: Bade'e Al Oud Oud for Glory
notes: Top notes are Saffron, Nutmeg and Lavender; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Patchouli; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Patchouli and Musk.

name: Wasim Akram 502
notes: Top notes are Cardamom, Apple and Sweet Orange; middle notes are Juniper Berries, Lavender and Clary Sage; base notes are Patchouli, Amber and Oakmoss.

name: Sultan
notes: Top Notes: Cardamom and Amber  Middle Notes: Leather,Jasmine, Spices  Base Notes: Oakmoss and Patchouli

name: Shah Intense
notes: Top Notes: Cardamom  Middle Notes: Leather and Jasmine Sambac  Base Notes: Amber, Moss and Patchouli

name: Haider
notes: Notes - Top Notes: Pineapple, Bergamot, Black Currant and Apple  Middle Notes: Birch, Patchouli, Moroccan Jasmine and Rose  Base Notes: Musk, Oak Moss, Ambergris and Vanilla

name: Ghilaf e Kaaba
notes: top notes of vetiver and woody notes. In the keynote. there is a touch of warm and spicy notes giving off a luxurious aroma. In base, notes are of agarwood, musk, and sandalwood.

name: Khan
notes: Top Notes: Lemon, Mint, Pink Pepper, Grapefruit Middle Notes: Ginger, Nutmeg, Jasmine Base Notes: Incense, Cedar, Sandalwood, Patchouli, White Musk

name: Shahi Khus
notes: Top Notes: Bergamot, Pink Pepper and Iris  Middle Notes: Jasmine, Vetiver and Almond  Base Notes: Sandalwood, Tonka Bean and Patchouli
